Articles.Content:
Found this option in the settings file. What does it do? It's just that the setting is rather worryingly bound to Scroll Lock, which happens to be my steam screenshot key. I don't want to be messing something up every time I take a screenshot.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T15:44:04Z" title="05/05/2015 03:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by Vectura**

If you have a 6-DOF controller, like [this one](http://www.3dconnexion.com/products/spacemouse/spacenavigator.html), it toggles between controlling the camera and controlling the vessel with it. If you don't have a 6-DOF controller it should not affect you.
That is good to know, thanks!
